mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, RDATE, WDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SUBSTR(RDATE, 1, 8)ORDER BY RDATE ASC) RNUM, SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, RDATE, WDATE FROM CALENDAR WHERE ID=#{id} AND SUBSTR(RDATE, 1, 6)=#{rdate}) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR(SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, RDATE, WDATE) VALUES(SEQ_CAL.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rdate}, SYSDATE)
